Title: Episode #2.2
Writer: Dennis Kelly (creator), Dennis Kelly, Huw Kennair-Jones (original idea), Mark Aldridge (original idea), Clare McDonald (original idea)
Actors: Adeel Akhtar, Paul Higgins, Neil Maskell, Fiona O'Shaughnessy
Plot: 3 months after the destruction of the manuscript, things have been quiet for Ian, Becky and Grant. Believing the Network to be finished, they each try to resume some semblance of normality, but the Network's plan is only just beginning.
